en.custom_events.public_events_title: Workshops in Approved and Public Events
en.custom_events.public_events_content: We participate in local festivals, multicultural events, and open-air happenings. Our workshops attract people of all ages and backgrounds and add vibrant energy to public gatherings.
en.custom_events.assistance: We offer assistance with teacher selection, scheduling, and all organizational details free of charge. Our aim is to be a "glass window" to present forr√≥ to others and share its joy and cultural richness with as many people as possible. üåü
